attributes.action: obtain reassurances from the US that the next  presidential elections will take place in an honest, democratic and open fashion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent controversies regarding vote rigging in previous American presidential elections; We, the undersigned, do here by command and instruct our elected representitive to seek reassurances from the Ambassador to the Court of St.James that the next US Presidential elections will take place in fair and open surroundings with the assurance that no tampering will be tolerated, either with voting machinery or in the procedure of voter registration & ballot paper distribution.
